greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Width of moat of composite numbers surrounding n-th prime.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..10000
Jean-François Alcover, Frequency distribution up to 10^6 terms.
example: 23 has a buffer of 3 composites around it on each side: 20,21,22,23,24,25,26.
mathematica: a[n_] := Min[Prime[n] - Prime[n-1] - 1, Prime[n+1] - Prime[n] - 1]; a[1] = 0; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 100}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Apr 16 2013 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
